name: Moarmouz
short_description: Smart phones are becoming more and more common by the day and why not? They make life easy and fun for most of us. If you can’t find your way to a coffee shop where your friends are, you can use your smart phone to find out where you exactly are and where you need to head. If you have to make an urgent call but you don’t have credit balance in your phone, you can use Viber or Skype to make calls via Wi-Fi. If your home is integrated with your smart phone, you can control the temperature, lighting, and other systems while you’re away.
summary: MoArmouz – Your solution to all your smart phone screen protection
